definition: (coll.) to cover a shortfall by using funds intended for another purpose or by borrowing some money/(coll.) to snack
pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: He ate two loaves of bread before the meal.
sentences.chinese: 飯前，他墊補了兩塊麪包。
